amendatorysection.catchline: Producer, supplier, distributor, wholesaler, importer, or exporter; license required.
amendatorysection.para: Before engaging in business as a producer, supplier, distributor, wholesaler, importer, or exporter, a person shall procure a license from the department permitting him or her to transact such business within the State of Nebraska. After reviewing the application required in section 66-483, the department may issue a license as provided in this section.

annotation.para: Increase in tax does not relieve sureties from obligation on bond. State v. Smith, 135 Neb. 423, 281 N.W. 851 (1938).
